name: Burrough of Glyster
description:
Glyster--The Perfume Quarter

A lively place brimming with intrigue, traffic and strange aromas. There's money to be made here, and plenty of ways to get in trouble too.

A burrough made for/inspired by  Electric Bastionland ttrp by Chris McDowall, or for use with any 'ol roleplaying game.  Imagination stimulation, fill in the blanks.

A 2 page .pdf, which could be printed and folded in half
(but  really best viewed in color).

Please enjoy for free, or throw me a couple bones if you're so inclined.

Thanks for lookin'!
